note.p: Merchant trading with Brazil. Of Baston, Hayes, Kent. Brother of John Ward of Holwood, Keston, Kent.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/483/6/5/4)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 February 2018)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2124/244)
